find_package(asio REQUIRED)
projname_print_target_properties(asio::asio)
set_property(TARGET
    asio::asio
  PROPERTY
    IMPORTED_GLOBAL TRUE
)
set_property(TARGET
    asio::asio
  APPEND PROPERTY
    INTERFACE_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS
      ASIO_NO_DEPRECATED
)
if(NOT MSVC)
    target_compile_options(asio::asio
      INTERFACE
        -Wno-error=zero-as-null-pointer-constant
    )
endif()
